creditline: Bequest of Dr. John I. Coe
description: view of city sidewalk on rainy, gray day; many people--most carrying umbrellas; entrance to subway at right; buildings at left
inscription: verso, in black ink: # / Rush hour | verso, in pencil: 6 (circled)
provenance: (Milch Gallery, New York, sold to Coe, 1947); John I. Coe, Bloomington, Minn., 1947-d.2011; Estate of John I. Coe, New Brighton, Minn.; bequethed to MIA in 2011.
title: Rush Hour
